title: How to Ride a Bike With Two People

steps.title: Have the more experienced cyclist mount first.
steps.content: Have the more experienced cyclist mount first. In preparing to go, the first person should hold the handlebars firmly and stand, both feet flat on the ground, while the other person mounts.

steps.title: Have the other person sit down on the seat and put their feet on the rear axles while holding onto the first person.
steps.content: Have the other person sit down on the seat and put their feet on the rear axles while holding onto the first person. It is much easier if the person in front has a backpack.

steps.title: Set off.
steps.content: Set off. The person in front should put their foot on the pedal and gently take off. This is difficult, but you have to keep the bike as straight up and down as possible, or else the takeoff is nearly impossible.

steps.title: Have the person in front stand up while pedaling.
steps.content: Have the person in front stand up while pedaling. If their legs get tired, and they're riding a man's style bicycle, they can sit on the tube, but they can't sit directly on it. It hurts. They have to sit on one side of that particular body part.

steps.title: If you have a mountain bike you could try having the second person sit on the handlebars.
steps.content: If you have a mountain bike you could try having the second person sit on the handlebars.

steps.title: Have the second person mount the handlebars and hold on.
steps.content: Have the second person mount the handlebars and hold on.

steps.title: Get the person pedaling to use their legs to gain some momentum.
steps.content: Get the person pedaling to use their legs to gain some momentum. Once speed is gained, driver can pedal like normal.

steps.title: Note that the driver can alternate from which side of neck he looks on.
steps.content: Note that the driver can alternate from which side of neck he looks on. And the rider on handlebars can leave their legs dangling in the air.

steps.title: Try to go as fast as you feel safe.
steps.content: Try to go as fast as you feel safe. The faster you go, the easier it is to balance. This method is quite fun. It is easy to go fast.

steps.title: Dismount.
steps.content: Dismount. For the rider to dismount all they need to do is hop off.
